events.message: I recently purchased a headset from your store but want to request a refund because it doesn't meet my expectations.
The support system has categorized the customer's request as a refund inquiry due to dissatisfaction with the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund and return processes.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund for your recent purchase. I'd be happy to assist.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting the refund so I can assist further?
The order number is 123456789, and I want a refund because the headset does not work properly and has poor sound quality.
Thank you for the details. We can process your refund once we receive the returned product. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to ease this process.
Thanks for the help! I appreciate the prepaid label and the quick response. I will send the item back today.
We have received the returned headset and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As per your confirmation, we are closing this refund request case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day.
